subject: Add --sdk-url support to Claude Code session creation
description: Modify build_create_session_command() in maestro-cli/src/claude/session.rs to add --sdk-url flag when companion is enabled. The SDK URL should point to maestro-api's WebSocket endpoint: ws://localhost:8080/companion/cli/{session_id} (local) or wss://maestro-api.../companion/cli/{session_id} (remote). Include --print --output-format stream-json --input-format stream-json flags.
activeForm: Adding --sdk-url support to Claude session creation
